python:
from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from event_manager import *
import time

event_manager.reset()

def on_event_condition_callback_A_k_X_F_q():
  global timer
  print(running_time())
  timer = running_time() + 1000

event_manager.add_condition_event(lambda:(running_time() >= timer), on_event_condition_callback_A_k_X_F_q)

if True:
  timer = 0
  timer = running_time() + 1000

while True:
  event_manager.run()
  time.sleep_ms(50)
